pages.text: Reduce all matter to its most basic form. This simple ritual converts any items in a chest directly above it into cobblestone, perfect for clearing unwanted items or generating infinite cobblestone from renewable resources.

pages.title: Costs & Details
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 1000 LP$(br)$(bold)Refresh:$() 1 LP per item$(br)$(bold)Refresh Time:$() 1 tick$(br2)$(bold)Usage:$() Place a chest 1 block above the Master Ritual Stone. The ritual will convert items in the chest to cobblestone at a rate of 1 item per tick.$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() Cobblestone itself is not converted.

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: Perfect for:$(li)Trash disposal$(li)Converting excess mob drops$(li)Generating cobblestone from mob farms$(li)Clearing inventory of junk items$(br2)$(italic)All things return to dust... or in this case, cobblestone.$()
